医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Fertility Mapper 推出突破性的 NHS 生育资金计算器Fertility Mapper 是由社区数据支持的生育诊所审查平台，今天发布了一份全新的全英国报告《生育的真实成本》，利用透明度作为提高人们对生育真实成本的认识和理解的催化剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Fertility-Mapper-launches-groundwriting-NHS-Fertility-Funding-Calculator.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Fertility-Mapper-launches-groundwriting-NHS-Fertility-Funding-Calculator.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6fcaac2-c27c-4197-875e-2656672beea3 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 02:02:00 -0500 Fertility Mapper launches groundbreaking NHS Fertility Funding Calculator
柳树皮可能是一种新的抗病毒药物的来源科学家发现，经过特殊处理的柳树皮提取物样品具有抗病毒作用，而这种作用在已知的柳树皮医学化合物（例如现代阿司匹林的前体水杨酸）中是不存在的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Willow-bark-may-be-the-source-of-a-new-antiviral-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Willow-bark-may-be-the-source-of-a-new-antiviral-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5932dbfc-e4fd-4146-b09f-f1a5b0335177 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:40:00 -0500 Willow bark may be the source of a new antiviral drug
UNITE4TB 启动临床试验计划，为结核病患者带来新希望今天，致力于快速开发创新结核病 (TB) 治疗方法的国际公私合作伙伴 UNITE4TB 宣布启动其 2B/C 期临床试验计划，第一位参与者在开普敦的试验中心入组。南非。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-hope-for-TB-病人-as-UNITE4TB-launches-clinical-tri-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-hope-for-TB- Patients-as-UNITE4TB-launches-clinical-Trial-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3923c962-9346-4335-968b-1555f40fa294 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:35:00 -0500 New hope for TB patients as UNITE4TB launches clinical trial program
研究表明补充维生素 D 可降低未来患痴呆症的风险每个人都知道维生素 D 对于健康的骨骼和更强的免疫系统至关重要，但维生素 D 水平低是否会成为阿尔茨海默病和与年龄相关的认知能力下降的主要驱动因素呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Vitamin-D-supplementation-may-reduce-future-dementia-risk-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Vitamin-D-supplementation-may-reduce-future-dementia-risk-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6452080f-f4cf-4081-ba5d-38f796748b56 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:31:00 -0500 Vitamin D supplementation may reduce future dementia risk, study suggests
中冠生物推出大规模类器官面板筛选平台，加速临床前肿瘤药物发现全球合同研究组织 (CRO) 和 JSR 生命科学公司 Crown Bioscience 今天宣布推出其突破性服务产品 OrganoidXploreTM。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Crown-Bioscience-launches-large-scale-organoid-panel-screening-platform-for-accelerated-preclinical-oncology-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Crown-Bioscience-launches-large-scale-organoid-panel-screening-platform-for-accelerated-preclinical-oncology-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fce3ce91-8ca8-4ecd-9ac5-2056ec89569e Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:27:00 -0500 Crown Bioscience launches large-scale organoid panel screening platform for accelerated preclinical oncology drug discovery
玫琳凯阿什基金会和德克萨斯大学西南医学中心庆祝在推进癌症研究方面的成功合作五年玫琳凯·阿什基金会 (Mary Kay Ash Foundation) 是寻找女性癌症治疗方法数十年的领导者和倡导者，与位于德克萨斯州达拉斯市的美国首屈一指的学术医疗中心之一 UT 西南医学中心 (UT Southwestern Medical Center) 正在庆祝五年来的成功合作国际癌症研究博士后学者奖学金计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Mary-Kay-Ash-Foundation-and-UT-Southwestern-celebrate- Five-years-of-successful-collaboration-in-advancing-cancer-research。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Mary-Kay-Ash-Foundation-and-UT-Southwestern-celebrate- Five-years-of-successful-collaboration-in-advancing-cancer-research。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ec7dacc-3ef1-46f4-a7b4-560af63eba08 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:26:00 -0500 Mary Kay Ash Foundation and UT Southwestern celebrate five years of successful collaboration in advancing cancer research
AdvanCell 达到里程碑，成为第一位接受 212Pb-ADVC001 治疗的前列腺癌患者AdvanCell 是一家为癌症患者开发一系列靶向阿尔法疗法的放射性制药公司，今天宣布首例患者接受了 212Pb-ADVC001 治疗，这是一种正在开发的靶向阿尔法疗法，用于治疗 PSMA 阳性转移性去势抵抗性前列腺癌 (mCRPC) 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/AdvanCell-reaches-milestone-as-first-prostate-cancer-病人-dosed-with-212Pb-ADVC001.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/AdvanCell-reaches-milestone-as-first-prostate-cancer-病人-dosed-with-212Pb-ADVC001.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5c4b916-b736-4cc7-8c22-de55aa677bd2 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:21:00 -0500 AdvanCell reaches milestone as first prostate cancer patient dosed with 212Pb-ADVC001
新报告强调了寻求自闭症诊断和评估的儿童的候补危机领先的儿童发展和行为健康公司 Cognoa 今天发布了一份新报告，《美国儿童自闭症诊断状况：僵局、不平等和错失机会持续存在》，该报告强调了寻求诊断的儿童及其家人长期存在的候补危机。发育迟缓和自闭症评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-report-underscores-the-waitlist-crisis-for-children-seeking-autism-diagnosis-and-evaluation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-report-underscores-the-waitlist-crisis-for-children-seeking-autism-diagnosis-and-evaluation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=086b7e47-b0de-4624-86a4-f823345e018a Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:18:00 -0500 New report underscores the waitlist crisis for children seeking autism diagnosis and evaluation
英国监管机构批准一种用于肥胖和超重患者体重管理的糖尿病药物药品和保健产品监管局 (MHRA) 今天（2023 年 11 月 8 日）通过国家申请途径批准了糖尿病药物 Mounjaro（替泽帕肽）的新适应症，用于 18 岁及以上成年人的减肥和体重管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/UK-regulator-approves-a-diabetes-drug-for-weight-management-in-obese-and-overweight-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/UK-regulator-approves-a-diabetes-drug-for-weight-management-in-obese-and-overweight-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fbe3099-c999-4a40-81a3-1d53eb08b4c0 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:16:00 -0500 UK regulator approves a diabetes drug for weight management in obese and overweight patients
研究发现食物过敏可能与心血管死亡风险增加有关新的研究表明，对乳制品和花生等常见食物过敏原的敏感性可能是导致心脏病的一个重要原因，但此前并未得到重视，而心血管死亡风险的增加包括没有明显食物过敏的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Food-allergies-may-be-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-death-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Food-allergies-may-be-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-death-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0ad871e-9b09-4a83-a8b1-9e90b1ce35c5 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:13:00 -0500 Food allergies may be linked to increased cardiovascular death risk, study finds
